title: As Output Parameters
description: In this lab, we learn that closures can be used as input parameters and can also be returned as output parameters by utilizing impl Trait and specifying the valid traits (Fn, FnMut, FnOnce). The move keyword is used to indicate that all captures occur by value, avoiding invalid references.

meta.title: Closures as Output Parameters in Rust
meta.description: Learn how to use closures as output parameters in Rust, leveraging Fn, FnMut, and FnOnce traits.
meta.keywords: rust playground, fnmut, closures, rust tutor, output parameters, rust online compiler, rust commands, fn, rust practice, rust online
